text: Augusta Victoria Hospital is a hospital on Mount of Olives, Jerusalem. It was built in 1907. It was named after Augusta Viktoria of Schleswig-Holstein, the wife of German Kaiser Wilhelm II. == Other websites == * Augusta Victoria on the Israel Traveler website. Category:1907 establishments in Asia Category:Hospitals in Jerusalem Category:Mount of Olives Category:1900s establishments in Israel
title: Augusta Victoria Hospital
